org.jdesktop.core.animation.timing

Interface Trigger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTrigger

    public interface Trigger
    This interface provides methods supported by all triggers, an event-driven approach to starting an animation. Methods are provided to disarm a trigger and check if it is armed.
    Author:
    Chet Haase, Tim Halloran

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disarm()
      Disables this trigger.
      boolean isArmed()
      Gets if this trigger is armed.

    • Method Detail

      • disarm

        void disarm()
        Disables this trigger. If the event that fires this trigger occurs subsequently it will be ignored.

        This method is safe to call from any thread.

      • isArmed

        boolean isArmed()
        Gets if this trigger is armed.

        This method is safe to call from any thread.

        Returns:
        true indicates that this trigger is armed, false indicates that it has been disarmed with a call to disarm().
